mapper.select: SELECT SEVICE_FEE_CALC_YEAR_MONTH AS seviceFeeCalcYearMonth, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, BRANCH_GUBUN_CODE AS branchGubunCode, OPER_TIME_GUBUN_CODE AS operTimeGubunCode, TERMINAL_COUNT AS terminalCount, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE AS checkOperEnable, BASIC_SEVICE_FEE AS basicSeviceFee, TERMINAL_ADD_SEVICE_FEE AS terminalAddSeviceFee, TIME_ADD_SEVICE_FEE AS timeAddSeviceFee, CHECK_ADD_SEVICE_FEE AS checkAddSeviceFee, OPER_DATE_COUNT AS operDateCount, MONTH_SEVICE_FEE AS monthSeviceFee, PENALTY AS penalty, TOTAL_GIVE_SEVICE_FEE AS totalGiveSeviceFee, NOTE AS note FROM ATMS_04001130

SELECT SEVICE_FEE_CALC_YEAR_MONTH AS seviceFeeCalcYearMonth, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, BRANCH_GUBUN_CODE AS branchGubunCode, OPER_TIME_GUBUN_CODE AS operTimeGubunCode, TERMINAL_COUNT AS terminalCount, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE AS checkOperEnable, BASIC_SEVICE_FEE AS basicSeviceFee, TERMINAL_ADD_SEVICE_FEE AS terminalAddSeviceFee, TIME_ADD_SEVICE_FEE AS timeAddSeviceFee, CHECK_ADD_SEVICE_FEE AS checkAddSeviceFee, OPER_DATE_COUNT AS operDateCount, MONTH_SEVICE_FEE AS monthSeviceFee, PENALTY AS penalty, TOTAL_GIVE_SEVICE_FEE AS totalGiveSeviceFee, NOTE AS note FROM ATMS_04001130 WHERE SEVICE_FEE_CALC_YEAR_MONTH = #{seviceFeeCalcYearMonth}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_04001130 WHERE SEVICE_FEE_CALC_YEAR_MONTH = #{seviceFeeCalcYearMonth}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

UPDATE ATMS_04001130 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, BRANCH_GUBUN_CODE = #{branchGubunCode}, OPER_TIME_GUBUN_CODE = #{operTimeGubunCode}, TERMINAL_COUNT = #{terminalCount}, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE = #{checkOperEnable}, BASIC_SEVICE_FEE = #{basicSeviceFee}, TERMINAL_ADD_SEVICE_FEE = #{terminalAddSeviceFee}, TIME_ADD_SEVICE_FEE = #{timeAddSeviceFee}, CHECK_ADD_SEVICE_FEE = #{checkAddSeviceFee}, OPER_DATE_COUNT = #{operDateCount}, MONTH_SEVICE_FEE = #{monthSeviceFee}, PENALTY = #{penalty}, TOTAL_GIVE_SEVICE_FEE = #{totalGiveSeviceFee}, NOTE = #{note} WHERE SEVICE_FEE_CALC_YEAR_MONTH = #{seviceFeeCalcYearMonth}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

INSERT INTO ATMS_04001130 ( SEVICE_FEE_CALC_YEAR_MONTH, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, BRANCH_GUBUN_CODE, OPER_TIME_GUBUN_CODE, TERMINAL_COUNT, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE, BASIC_SEVICE_FEE, TERMINAL_ADD_SEVICE_FEE, TIME_ADD_SEVICE_FEE, CHECK_ADD_SEVICE_FEE, OPER_DATE_COUNT, MONTH_SEVICE_FEE, PENALTY, TOTAL_GIVE_SEVICE_FEE, NOTE ) VALUES ( #{seviceFeeCalcYearMonth}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{branchGubunCode}, #{operTimeGubunCode}, #{terminalCount}, #{checkOperEnable}, #{basicSeviceFee}, #{terminalAddSeviceFee}, #{timeAddSeviceFee}, #{checkAddSeviceFee}, #{operDateCount}, #{monthSeviceFee}, #{penalty}, #{totalGiveSeviceFee}, #{note} )
